Scientific_title: A Two Part, Phase 2 Open-label, Multi-Centre, Dose Escalation Hemodynamic Study to Evaluate Dose-Response and Safety of Inhaled LIQ861 (Treprostinil) in Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension (WHO Group 1) Subjects
Study_design: Intervention model: Sequential Assignment. Primary purpose: Treatment. Masking: None (Open Label).
Public_title: Hemodynamic Evaluation of Dose-response and Safety of Dry Powder Inhalation of Treprostinil
